name: Assassins_Slash_Stealth
display_help: A signature Stalker attack. This attack does superior lethal damage on its own as a frontal attack and cannot be interrupted. However, if it is executed while you are Hidden, this attack will do tremendous damage, as you impale your unsuspecting foe. This attack may be interrupted if you move or are attacked while executing this power and are hidden. Using this power while not hidden has a chance to critically hit equal to 33.3% times the number of stacks of Assassin's Focus. Using Assassin's Strike when not hidden will remove all stacks of Assassin's Focus regardless if you critically hit or not. Damage: Special, Recharge: Slow

name: Ranged_Shot_Quick
display_help: A long range shot that blasts your foes. This is a sniper attack, but due to your high chance to hit, it is not interruptible. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

name: Ranged_Shot_Normal
display_help: A long range shot that blasts your foes. Like most sniper attacks, this power has a bonus to Accuracy, but is best fired from a distance as it can be interrupted. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

name: Sniper_Rifle_Quick
display_help: Sniper Rifle is a powerful piece of hardware. It is very accurate and has a very long range. The impressive round can knock down its target. This is a sniper attack, but due to your high chance to hit, it is not interruptible. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

name: Sniper_Rifle_Normal
display_help: Sniper Rifle is a powerful piece of hardware. It is very accurate and has a very long range. The impressive round can knock down its target. Like most sniper attacks, you must take your time to aim, so this attack can be interrupted. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

name: Penetrating_Ray_Quick
display_help: You take careful aim at your target and deliver a punishing supercharged shot from your Beam Rifle. This causes Extreme Energy damage and may knock the target off their feet. If the target is also suffering from the Disintegrating effect it will also suffer additional damage over time. This is a sniper attack, but due to your high chance to hit, it is not interruptible. In addition, targets already affected by the Disintegrating effect will cause this effect to spread to 3 nearby targets. This Disintegrate Spread effect can only hit targets that aren't already affected by the Disintegrating effect. Disintegrate Spread causes Minor Energy damage over time. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Slow
display_short_help: Sniper, Extreme Dmg(Energy), Foe Knockdown, Special

name: Penetrating_Ray_Normal
display_help: You take careful aim at your target and deliver a punishing supercharged shot from your Beam Rifle. This causes Extreme Energy damage and may knock the target off their feet. If the target is also suffering from the Disintegrating effect it will also suffer additional damage over time. Like all Sniper attacks it will be interrupted if you're attacked. In addition, targets already affected by the Disintegrating effect will cause this effect to spread to 3 nearby targets. This Disintegrate Spread effect can only hit targets that aren't already affected by the Disintegrating effect. Disintegrate Spread causes Minor Energy damage over time. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Slow
display_short_help: Sniper, Extreme Dmg(Energy), Foe Knockdown, Special

name: Moonbeam_Quick
display_help: An extremely long range and accurate beam of Negative Energy that deals tremendous damage and reduces the target's chance to hit. This is a sniper attack, but due to your high chance to hit, it is not interruptible. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

name: Moonbeam_Normal
display_help: An extremely long range and accurate beam of Negative Energy that deals tremendous damage and reduces the target's chance to hit. This is a sniper attack, and like most sniper attacks, is best fired from a distance as it can be interrupted. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

name: Zapp_Quick
display_help: A focused electrical blast that can travel great distances with high Accuracy. Zapp drains Endurance, and some of this may transfer back to you. This is a sniper attack, but due to your high chance to hit, it is not interruptible. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

name: Zapp_Normal
display_help: A focused electrical blast that can travel great distances with high Accuracy. Zapp drains Endurance, and is best fired from a distance, as it can be interrupted. Some of the Endurance you drain may transfer back to you. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

name: Sniper_Blast_Quick
display_help: A focused blast that can travel great distances with high Accuracy. This is a sniper attack, but due to your high chance to hit, it is not interruptible. Sniper Blast may knock targets backwards. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

name: Sniper_Blast_Normal
display_help: A focused blast that can travel great distances with high Accuracy. This is a sniper attack, and is best fired from a distance, as it can be interrupted. Sniper Blast may knock targets backwards. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

name: Psionic_Lance_Quick
display_help: This extremely long range Psionic attack has a bonus to Accuracy, and can Slow a target's attack rate. This is a sniper attack, but due to your high chance to hit, it is not interruptible. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

name: Psionic_Lance_Normal
display_help: This extremely long range Psionic attack has a bonus to Accuracy, and can Slow a target's attack rate. This is a sniper attack, and is best fired from a distance as it can be interrupted. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

name: Proton_Volley_Quick
display_help: Hurls a volley of alpha particles over an extremely long range. Proton Volley can bypass some of a target's defenses and reduce the target's Defense. This is a sniper attack, but due to your high chance to hit, it is not interruptible. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

display_help: Hurls a volley of alpha particles over an extremely long range. Proton Volley can bypass some of a target's defenses and reduce the target's Defense. This is a sniper attack, and is best fired from a distance as it can be interrupted. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

name: Thunder_Strike_AoE
display_help: A massive attack. You smash your foes with all the power of a lightning bolt. The pummeled victim takes tremendous damage and may be Disoriented. Any nearby foes may be knocked down and take some damage from the shockwave. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
display_short_help: Melee (AoE), High DMG(Smash, Energy), Foe Disorient, Knockback

name: Sniper_Blast_Quick
display_help: A focused blast that can travel great distances with high Accuracy. This is a sniper attack, but due to your high chance to hit, it is not interruptible. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

name: Sniper_Blast_Normal
display_help: A focused blast that can travel great distances with high Accuracy. This is a sniper attack, and is best fired from a distance, as it can be interrupted. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

name: Blazing_Bolt_Quick
display_help: A long range beam of fire that blasts your foes. This is a sniper attack, but due to your high chance to hit, it is not interruptible. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

name: Blazing_Bolt_Normal
display_help: A long range beam of fire that blasts your foes. Like most sniper attacks, this power has a bonus to its chance to hit, but is best fired from a distance as it can be interrupted. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

name: Kinetic_Lance_Quick
display_help: You form the potential energies around you into a lance of energy that you fire at a single target. This lance pierces the target, causing an initial burst of lethal damage that then becomes a smaller lethal damage over time effect. This attack will also build Impulse. When you have at least one stack of Impulse, this power will also reduce the target's damage potential and smashing/energy resistance. This is a sniper attack, but due to your high chance to hit, it is not interruptible. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Slow
display_short_help: Sniper, Extreme DMG (Lethal, Energy), Special (Power Amplified)

name: Kinetic_Lance_Normal
display_help: You form the potential energies around you into a lance of energy that you fire at a single target. This lance pierces the target, causing an initial burst of lethal damage that then becomes a smaller lethal damage over time effect. This attack will also build Impulse. When you have at least one stack of Impulse, this power will also reduce the target's damage potential and smashing/energy resistance. This is a sniper attack, and is best fired from a distance, as it can be interrupted. If you are engaged in battle this attack becomes instant-cast. If you are not engaged, it will do bonus damage. When used against players in PvP situations, this power will grant additional contribution toward your Domination. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Slow
display_short_help: Sniper, Extreme DMG (Lethal, Energy), Special (Power Amplified)

name: Masterful_Throw_Quick
display_help: You take careful aim and let loose an extremely accurate, extremely forceful blade. This is a sniper attack, but due to your high chance to hit, it is not interruptible. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
display_short_help: Sniper, Extreme DMG(Lethal), Chance for DoT (Lethal)

name: Masterful_Throw_Normal
display_help: You take careful aim and let loose an extremely accurate, extremely forceful blade. This is a sniper attack, and is best fired from a distance, as it can be interrupted. If you are engaged in battle this attack becomes instant-cast. If you are not engaged, it will do bonus damage. Recharge: Slow
display_short_help: Sniper, Extreme DMG(Lethal), Chance for DoT (Lethal)

name: Explosive_Shuriken
display_help: You rig a shuriken with a powerful explosive, then send it flying towards your enemies. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
display_short_help: Ranged, Superior DMG(Fire), Minor Splash Damage (Fire DoT)

name: Psionic_Lance_Quick
display_help: This extremely long range Psionic attack has a bonus to Accuracy, and can Slow a target's attack rate. This is a sniper attack, but due to your high chance to hit, it is not interruptible. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

name: Psionic_Lance_Normal
display_help: This extremely long range Psionic attack has a bonus to Accuracy, and can Slow a target's attack rate. This is a sniper attack, and is best fired from a distance as it can be interrupted. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

name: Proton_Volley_Quick
display_help: Hurls a volley of alpha particles over an extremely long range. Proton Volley can bypass some of a target's defenses and reduce the target's Defense. This is a sniper attack, and is best fired from a distance as it can be interrupted. If you are engaged in battle this attack becomes instant-cast. If you are not engaged, it will do bonus damage. Affected enemies have a small chance to be affected by the Contaminated effect. Hitting Contaminated foes with single target Radioactive Assault powers cause a small burst of damage to foes near the target. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

name: Proton_Volley_Normal
display_help: Hurls a volley of alpha particles over an extremely long range. Proton Volley can bypass some of a target's defenses and reduce the target's Defense. This is a sniper attack, and is best fired from a distance as it can be interrupted. If you are engaged in battle this attack becomes instant-cast. If you are not engaged, it will do bonus damage. Affected enemies have a small chance to be affected by the Contaminated effect. Hitting Contaminated foes with single target Radioactive Assault powers cause a small burst of damage to foes near the target. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

name: Neutrino_Bolt_Contamination
display_help: A very quick, but low damage attack. Neutrino Bolt can reduce the target's Defense. Affected enemies have a small chance to be affected by the Contaminated effect. Hitting Contaminated foes with single target Radioactive Assault powers cause a small burst of damage to foes near the target. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

name: Contaminated_Strike_Contamination
display_help: You charge your fist with harmful radioactive particles and quickly strike your foe dealing Light Energy and Smashing damage as well as reducing their defense. Affected enemies have a small chance to be affected by the Contaminated effect. Hitting Contaminated foes with single target Radioactive Assault powers cause a small burst of damage to foes near the target. Damage: Light, Recharge: Very Fast

name: X-Ray_Beam_Contamination
display_help: You can emit a beam of X-Ray energy from your eyes, dealing moderate Energy damage. This attack can bypass some defenses and can reduce the target's Defense. Affected enemies have a small chance to be affected by the Contaminated effect. Hitting Contaminated foes with single target Radioactive Assault powers cause a small burst of damage to foes near the target. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Radiation_Siphon_Contamination
display_help: You pummel your foe with a deadly smashing attack dealing High Energy and Smashing damage and reducing their defense. Hitting Contaminated targets will also heal you for a large amount of health over 3 seconds and remove the Contaminated effect from the target. However, uncontaminated targets have a moderate chance to be affected by the Contaminated effect. Hitting Contaminated foes with single target Radioactive Assault powers cause a small burst of damage to foes near the target. Damage: High Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

name: Devastating_Blow_Contamination
display_help: You hammer your foe with a brutal smashing attack charged with a lethal dose of radiation. Your target will suffer Extreme Energy and Smashing damage, will have its defense reduced and will be disoriented for a short time. Devastating Blow has an increased change to critically hit. Affected enemies will be affected by the Contaminated effect. Hitting Contaminated foes with single target Radioactive Assault powers cause a small burst of damage to foes near the target. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Long
display_short_help: Melee, Extreme DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe -Def, Disorient, Special

name: Proton_Volley_Quick_Contamination
display_help: Hurls a volley of alpha particles over an extremely long range. Proton Volley can bypass some of a target's defenses and reduce the target's Defense. This is a sniper attack, and is best fired from a distance as it can be interrupted. If you are engaged in battle this attack becomes instant-cast. If you are not engaged, it will do bonus damage. Affected enemies have a small chance to be affected by the Contaminated effect. Hitting Contaminated foes with single target Radioactive Assault powers cause a small burst of damage to foes near the target. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

display_help: Hurls a volley of alpha particles over an extremely long range. Proton Volley can bypass some of a target's defenses and reduce the target's Defense. This is a sniper attack, and is best fired from a distance as it can be interrupted. If you are engaged in battle this attack becomes instant-cast. If you are not engaged, it will do bonus damage. name: Assassins_Blades_Stealth
display_help: A signature Stalker attack. This attack does superior lethal damage on its own as a frontal attack and cannot be interrupted. However, if it is executed while you are Hidden, this attack will do tremendous lethal damage, as you impale your unsuspecting foe. This attack may be interrupted if you move or are attacked while executing this power and are hidden. Using this power while not hidden has a chance to critically hit equal to 33.3% times the number of stacks of Assassin's Focus. This power is needed for the Empower and Sweep combination attacks. Using Assassin's Strike when not hidden will remove all stacks of Assassin's Focus regardless if you critically hit or not. Damage: Special, Recharge: Slow

name: Resistance
display_help: The Venus Fly Trap is highly resistant to Smashing, Cold, Energy, Negative, Toxic, and Psionic Damage. It also has a high defense to Psionic Attacks. It is, however unprotected from Fire and Lethal Damage. Its tendency to regrow quickly when damaged also grants it a boosted regeneration rate.

name: Mental_Training
display_help: The Fortunata Mistress is resistant to Psionic Damage, as well as Sleep, Hold, Immobilization and Disorient effects. They have improved Defense and Accuracy.

name: Assassins_Psi_Blade_Stealth
display_help: A signature Stalker attack. This attack does superior psionic and smashing damage on its own as a frontal attack and cannot be interrupted. However, if it is executed while you are Hidden, this attack will do tremendous damage, as you waylay your unsuspecting foe. This attack may be interrupted if you move or are attacked while executing this power and are hidden. Using this power while not hidden has a chance to critically hit equal to 33.3% times the number of stacks of Assassin's Focus. Using Assassin's Psi Blade has a good chance to grant Insight if used while not hidden and a very high chance to grant Insight if used while hidden. Using Assassin's Strike when not hidden will remove all stacks of Assassin's Focus regardless if you critically hit or not. Damage: Special, Recharge: Slow

name: Assassins_Psi_Blade_Quick
display_help: A signature Stalker attack. This attack does superior psionic and smashing damage on its own as a frontal attack and cannot be interrupted. name: Assassins_Strike_Stealth
display_help: A signature Stalker attack. This attack does superior energy and smashing damage on its own as a frontal attack and cannot be interrupted. However, if it is executed while you are Hidden, this attack will do tremendous damage, as you waylay your unsuspecting foe. This attack may be interrupted if you move or are attacked while executing this power and are hidden. Using this power while not hidden has a chance to critically hit equal to 33.3% times the number of stacks of Assassin's Focus. Using Assassin's Strike when not hidden will remove all stacks of Assassin's Focus regardless if you critically hit or not. Assassin's Corruption also has a very high chance to inflict Contaminated while hidden and a high chance while unhidden. Hitting Contaminated foes with single target Radiation Melee powers cause a small burst of damage to foes near the target. Damage: Special, Recharge: Slow

name: Mace_Beam_Quick
display_help: Fires an extremely long range and accurate beam of kinetic Energy from the Bane Mace that deals tremendous damage and knocks the target back. This is a sniper attack, but due to your high chance to hit, it is not interruptible. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

name: Mace_Beam_Normal
display_help: Fires an extremely long range and accurate beam of kinetic Energy from the Bane Mace that deals tremendous damage and knocks the target back. This is a sniper attack, and like most sniper attacks, is best fired from a distance as it can be interrupted. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

name: Zapp_Quick
display_help: A focused blast of Mu electrical energy that can travel great distances with high Accuracy. Zapp drains Endurance, and is best fired from a distance, as it can be interrupted. Some of the Endurance you drain may transfer back to you. Damage: Extreme, Rech

name: Zapp_Normal
display_help: A focused blast of Mu electrical energy that can travel great distances with high Accuracy. Zapp drains Endurance, and is best fired from a distance, as it can be interrupted. Some of the Endurance you drain may transfer back to you. Damage: Extreme, Rech

name: Moonbeam_Quick
display_help: An extremely long range and accurate beam of Negative Energy that deals tremendous damage and reduces the target's Accuracy. This is a sniper attack, but due to your high chance to hit, it is not interruptible. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

name: Moonbeam_Normal
display_help: An extremely long range and accurate beam of Negative Energy that deals tremendous damage and reduces the target's Accuracy. This is a sniper attack, and like most sniper attacks, is best fired from a distance as it can be interrupted. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

name: Static_Field
display_help: All foes that pass near this field will be electrocuted.

name: Endurance_Recovered
display_help: You have recovered some endurance drained from a nearby foe.

name: Assassins_Strike_Stealth
display_help: A signature Stalker attack. This attack does superior smashing damage on its own as a frontal attack and cannot be interrupted. However, if it is executed while you are Hidden, this attack will do tremendous damage, as you waylay your unsuspecting foe. This attack may be interrupted if you move or are attacked while executing this power and are hidden. Using this power while not hidden has a chance to critically hit equal to 33.3% times the number of stacks of Assassin's Focus. Assassin's Strike builds 2 Combo Levels. Using Assassin's Strike when not hidden will remove all stacks of Assassin's Focus regardless if you critically hit or not. Damage: Special, Recharge: Slow

name: Assassins_Strike_Quick
display_help: A signature Stalker attack. This attack does superior smashing damage on its own as a frontal attack and cannot be interrupted. However, if it is executed while you are Hidden, this attack will do tremendous damage, as you waylay your unsuspecting foe. This attack may be interrupted if you move or are attacked while executing this power and are hidden. Using this power while not hidden has a chance to critically hit equal to 33.3% times the number of stacks of Assassin's Focus. Assassin's Strike builds 2 Combo Levels. Using Assassin's Strike when not hidden will remove all stacks of Assassin's Focus regardless if you critically hit or not. Damage: Special, Recharge: Slow

name: Superior_Scourging_Blast
display_help: Recovers 7.5% endurance and a small amount of health to nearby allies.

name: Thorntrops
display_help: All foes that walk through the Thorntrops will be Slowed and take damage.

name: Defensive_Sweep_Slow
display_help: You take a defensive stance and strike your opponents. Successfully executing this attack will cause light smashing damage to nearby foes, while giving you increased defense against their melee and smashing attacks. Damage: Light, Recharge: Fast

name: Defensive_Sweep_Fast
display_help: You take a defensive stance and strike your opponents. Successfully executing this attack will cause light smashing damage to nearby foes, while giving you increased defense against their melee and smashing attacks. Damage: Light, Recharge: Fast

name: Crushing_Blow_Slow
display_help: You swing a mighty crushing blow at your opponent dealing High Smashing damage and reducing their defense. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

name: Crushing_Blow_Fast
display_help: You swing a mighty crushing blow at your opponent dealing High Smashing damage and reducing their defense. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

name: Sweeping_Strike_Slow

name: Sweeping_Strike_Fast

display_help: You batter your enemy with your mighty weapon dealing Extreme Smashing damage and reducing their resistance to damage as well as their defense to all types of attacks for a short time. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Long

name: Arc_of_Destruction_Slow
display_help: You swing your weapon in a devastating Arc of Destruction that deals Superior Smashing damage and has a good chance to knock foes down. Arc of Destruction may only be used while on the ground. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

name: Arc_of_Destruction_Fast
display_help: You swing your weapon in a devastating Arc of Destruction that deals Superior Smashing damage and has a good chance to knock foes down. Arc of Destruction may only be used while on the ground. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

name: Time_Bomb
display_help: Your Henchman has placed a Time Bomb on the ground. The resulting massive explosion will devastate all nearby foes and send them flying, but will likely take your Henchman with it. The Time Bomb is small, and almost impossible to detect. However, it is fragile and may be set off by an enemy's explosion. Even if destroyed, the Bomb will still detonate.

name: Claw_Rake

name: Shadowy_Binds

Fast Immobilized foes cannot move but can still attack. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
